nodes.name: Entity2
nodes.content: If you want to know more about how this works you should speak to the entity on the left.

nodes.name: Entity2
nodes.content: Eventually I'll be able to tell if you have and change my dialogue to suit it.

nodes.name: Entity2
nodes.content: But I guess untill that gets implmented you'll have to do with me telling you to go speak to them.

nodes.name: Entity2
nodes.content: Seriously, I have nothing else to say. Go speak to them.
